articles.title: Thai Preparatory Committee Formed
articles.content:
Thai Preparatory Committee Formed 
    Pyongyang, January 26 (KCNA) -- A Thai preparatory committee was formed with due ceremony in Bangkok on Jan 19 to commemorate the Day of the Sun and February 16, the birthday of leader Kim Jong Il.
 At the ceremony, Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Thai Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.    
 The committee decided to set a period from February to April for commemorating the Day of the Sun and February 16 and hold colorful political and cultural functions in the period.
